subject: Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome
Baseball
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A former girlfriend of Roberto Alomar has brought a lawsuit against him, alleging he continued to have unprotected sex with her despite being infected with the virus that causes AIDS.
snippet: A former girlfriend of Roberto Alomar has brought a lawsuit against him, alleging he continued to have unprotected sex with her despite being infected with the virus that causes AIDS.
